gcci.text: H100 supply stabilizes as US-East capacity expansions ease chip scarcity, reducing capex pressures despite the $3.35/hr average price.

gtpi.text: Token costs are falling to $1.30/1M input as aggressive API price wars and model distillation push the industry toward greater efficiency.

gagl.text: The 120 TWh annual load underscores rising grid strain, making nuclear baseload essential for GW‑scale AI clusters while curbing carbon emissions.

aipi.text: Consolidation trends suggest a maturing AI market, where investors weigh bubble risks against sustainable growth trajectories.
